channel.title: Help asap please!
channel.description:
[center][color=red]BASE: PI, Relentless Scape. Problem: Compiling the server, Making .bat files into just, Files.. Server Compiler: [code]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code] Server Compiler Problem: [code]javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/code] Client Problem:
My client files are just .bat.... I would like to code the client, how would I go about doing this?
[/center]

item.title: Help asap please!

@Crazyjackson78 wrote:

if anyone has this source please pm me, thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Help asap please!

item.description:
@ryanyukon199 wrote:

Some tips to fix that is would be,
make sure the
C:/programs files etc… is DIRECTED TO THE RIGHT FOLDER
This error has also messed be up BUT
To fix it all i did was use a different compiler,
Try both of those and if they don’t work IDN!
Gl

Read full topic

item.title: Help asap please!
item.dc:creator: @adamknightz adamknightz
item.description:
@adamknightz wrote:

@echo off
Title Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_YOURVERSIONNUMBERHERE\bin\javac.exe" *.java
pause

Change “YOURVERSIONNUMBERHERE” to your latest Java version (latest version is 23).

Read full topic

item.title: Help asap please!
item.dc:creator: @Control_Pride Control Pride
item.description:
@Control_Pride wrote:

[center][color=red]BASE: PI, Relentless Scape.
Problem: Compiling the server, Making .bat files into just, Files…
Server Compiler:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
Server Compiler Problem:

javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
Client Problem:

My client files are just .bat.... I would like to code the client, how would I go about doing this?
[/center]

Read full topic
